name: Scarpa Kinesis Pro Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Men's
description: Durable and supportive, these backpacking boots are designed for thru-hiking, trekking, and exploring miles of rough terrain – with a heavy pack. Waterproof-breathable textiles keep your feet dry in case your trip includes rain or the trail turns into a creek bed. Flex zones around the ankle and memory foam behind the achilles tendon ensure your feet stay happy under load. Aggressive, sticky soled keep you stable on uneven terrain.Smooth, full-grain leather upper.GORE-TEX® Performance Comfort membrane keeps feet dry while allowing them to breathe.Full perimeter rubber rand protects the leather.Flex zones add comfort and smooth the break-in period.Foam ankle padding for a snug, secure fit.Dual-density polyurethane midsole has front and rear cushioning for a comfortable ride.TPU shank stabilizes feet on uneven terrain.Vibram® Biometric outsole lets your foot roll naturally.Vibram® XS Trek rubber and multidirectional lugs provide traction on steep or loose slopes.
